text: Willie & Phil is a 1980 American comedy drama movie directed by Paul Mazursky and starring Michael Ontkean, Margot Kidder, Ray Sharkey, Jan Miner, Kathleen Maguire, Jerry Hall. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky
title: Willie & Phil
